name: Cap Fund Now
desc: Cap Fund Now is an ISO marketplace platform where funders compete for merchant deals. Provides ISOs with access to large and boutique funders. Free for ISOs with same commission structure as direct funder relationships.

news.h: MCA Market Projected to Reach $25.38B by 2029
news.d: Market valued at $19.65B in 2025, projected 6.6% CAGR.

name: Capback

leaders.bg: Managing Partner of Capback Financial. Built reputation for 80% approval rate serving trucking, construction, restaurants, and health clinics.
hooks: 80% approval rate for credit-challenged businesses
Operating from Financial District since 2015
Serving niche industries like trucking and construction

desc: Capback Financial is a NYC-based MCA provider founded 2015. Specializes in credit-challenged businesses with 80% approval rate. Unsecured loans $5K-$250K with 48-hour approval and 24-hour funding.

name: CapFlow Network Inc.

leaders.bg: Founded CapFlow in 2021 after $3B+ in M&A/financing transactions over 15+ years. Former MD at Artha Group, positions at Guidehouse, Greenberg Advisors. UPenn graduate.
hooks: $3B+ in transactions across investment banking and PE
500+ lender network for $1M-$50M deals
Focused on lower middle market gap

desc: CapFlow Network Inc. is a fintech platform connecting borrowers seeking $1M-$50M in debt financing with 500+ lenders. Founded 2021, headquartered at 1 Rockefeller Plaza, NYC.
full_address: 1 Rockefeller Plaza, 11th Floor, New York, NY 10020

name: Capital Solutions, Inc.

leaders.bg: CPA who founded Capital Solutions in 2003. Career at Arthur Andersen, Heller Financial, Century Business Credit. BA from Claremont McKenna College.
hooks: CPA with Arthur Andersen and Heller Financial pedigree
Handles up to $15M monthly in facilities
20+ years in California alternative finance

desc: Capital Solutions, Inc. is a California-based commercial finance company founded 2003 specializing in invoice factoring, asset-based loans, PO financing. Serves businesses across Sacramento and Los Angeles with facilities up to $15M monthly.

name: Capital Source Group, LLC

leaders.bg: Co-founded CSG in 2015. MS Computer Science from DePaul University. Back-to-back Inc. 5000 rankings. Over $360M funded.
hooks: Back-to-back Inc. 5000 honoree
Computer science master's from DePaul
$360M+ funded across industries

leaders.bg: Joined as President in January 2024. Former Adperio Mobile CEO for 24 years. Binghamton University.
hooks: Serial entrepreneur — Adperio Mobile CEO for 24 years
Denver-based expanding CSG's geographic reach

leaders.bg: Established CSG initially as a broker. Previously built eBay cell phone business generating $500K+ revenue.
hooks: Built CSG from broker roots across multiple industries
Prior eBay business with $500K revenue

desc: Capital Source Group, LLC is a commercial financing firm founded 2015 in Chicago. $22M annual revenue (2025). Over $360M funded across 450+ transactions. Back-to-back Inc. 5000 honors.

news.h: Capital Source Group Ranks #2552 on 2025 Inc. 5000
news.d: Second consecutive Inc. 5000 ranking with 165% growth.
Delegation sent to International Factoring Association conference.

full_address: 209 W Jackson Blvd, Suite 613, Chicago, IL 60606

name: CapitalFront

leaders.bg: 20+ years in lending, risk management, capital markets. Former COO at New Penn Financial, CEO of Caliber Funding, COO of Freedom Mortgage. Named one of 100 most influential mortgage banking executives. Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac advisory boards. Wharton executive MBA.
hooks: Former Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac advisory board member
Named one of 100 most influential mortgage banking executives
Wharton executive MBA

leaders.bg: Serial entrepreneur. Founded PSC Info Group (twice Inc. 500). Chairman of RevSpring. Founder/Chairman of Thrivest Holdings. Philadelphia Union MLS team owner.
hooks: Founded PSC Info Group — twice Inc. 500
Philadelphia Union MLS team investor
Thrivest Holdings chairman in legal funding

desc: CapitalFront is a business lender launched November 2015 in Conshohocken, PA. Offers MCAs ($10K-$1M), ACH funding, SBA loans, receivable financing, factoring. Targets businesses with $350K-$20M annual sales. Backed by Experity Ventures.

news.h: CapitalFront Partners with Lenders One Cooperative
news.d: Partnership with mortgage cooperative for distribution.

name: Capitalize Group

leaders.bg: CEO leading MCA operations since founding in 2021. Partners with Kapitus, BlueVine, Rapid Finance, OnDeck, Credibly.
hooks: Lending marketplace partnering with major funders
Operating as both direct MCA and marketplace

desc: Capitalize Group LLC is a New York-based MCA provider and online marketplace founded 2021. Partners with Kapitus, BlueVine, Rapid Finance, OnDeck, Everest Business Funding, Credibly. Funding within 24 hours.

name: CapitalShift
desc: CapitalShift (Capital Shift Group) is an MCA provider based in Melville, New York. Approves businesses in less than 24 hours. Requires minimum 3 months in business, 500+ credit score, steady monthly revenue.

name: Capitawize

leaders.bg: CEO. Based in NYC metro. Cardozo School of Law at Yeshiva University. Previously at Zugot. Operates as Raritan Financial LLC DBA Capitawize.
hooks: Cardozo School of Law graduate
Prior experience at Zugot
Operating as Raritan Financial LLC DBA Capitawize

desc: CapitaWize (Raritan Financial LLC DBA Capitawize) is a small business funder based in Aventura, Florida. Offers fast working capital products — as fast as same day.

name: CapX Funding Corp.

leaders.bg: Founded CapX in 2002. Former VP Sales at ATEL Leasing. Portland State University. ~$3M annual revenue.
hooks: 20+ years in equipment financing
ATEL Leasing VP Sales background
'We say yes when banks say no' positioning

desc: CapX Funding Corp. is an equipment financing and working capital provider founded 2002 in the SF Bay Area. Loans up to $250K. ~$3M annual revenue. 'We say yes when banks say no.'
